name: string theories / acróbatas
description:
Part of the string theories series.

String theory predicts that everything is made up of tiny strings resonating. These works explore the idea that we all are resonating connected strings. That everything is. A tribute to generative as a concept. Strings with different resonating modes generate space and time, and everything therein. These are just lines rotating at different angular velocities.

A generative artwork by Marcelo Soria-Rodríguez, @msoriaro.

Made with Processing, 900x900px, 15s, 30fps looping mp4.
